example_en: The nurse checked my blood pressure.
The chef prepared a delicious meal.
She wants to become a pilot.
I go to the dentist twice a year.
The architect designed a new building.
She is the manager of the department.
The director made an important decision.
The professor teaches at the university.
I go to the barber once a month.
The designer created a new logo.
The judge made a fair decision.
The librarian helped me find a book.
I have a job interview tomorrow.
Send your resume to the company.
The company hired ten new employees.
He was fired from his job.
She got a promotion at work.
My colleague helped me with the project.
She has five years of experience.
She works part-time at the cafe.
I work full-time at the office.
He works as a freelancer from home.
There are two vacancies in our department.
We have a meeting at 10 AM.
We finished the project on time.
I got a raise last month.
Save the document to the file.
Send the invoice to the client.

example_ka: სამუშაო ადგილზე ყოველი უბედური შემთხვევა დაუყოვნებლივ შეატყობინე.

example_en: List your qualifications on your resume.
She works in the public sector.
Company headquarters is in New York.
I work in a downtown office.
List your accomplishments on your resume.
Follow your passion in career choices.
example_ka: კარიერის არჩევანში შენს ღია განწყობას მისდევი.

example_en: Only qualified applicants will be considered.
The museum curator organized the exhibit.
See a podiatrist for foot pain.
